name: Perspective (itch) (theneoxs)
description:
Perspective is a dynamic top-down shooter where the main task is to complete levels and destroy the bosses on them. 

You can play alone or with friends on the local network! At your disposal there are 11 characters of different specifics and tactics of action. 

Combine, experiment and get more points! The single player mode will give you the freedom to go through the campaign, and the multiplayer mode will give you a lot of positive emotions! 

ATTENTION: the game is in the pre-alpha stage, that is, in the process of development, more and more functionality will be gradually added to it, any suggestions will be heard
